name: audit-plugin
description: Audit logging plugin for tracking user actions and system events
author: Tauri App

entry_points.name: create_audit_log
entry_points.description: Create a new audit log entry for a user action

entry_points.name: get_user_audit_logs
entry_points.description: Get paginated audit logs for a specific user

entry_points.name: get_audit_logs_filtered
entry_points.description: Get audit logs with filtering options
